natspec.details: Wrappers around ERC20 operations that throw on failure. To use this library you can add a `using SafeERC20 for ERC20;` statement to your contract, which allows you to call the safe operations as `token.safeTransfer(...)`, etc.
natspec.title: SafeERC20
